description: A flaw has been found in Abdullah-Hasan-Sajjad Online-School up to f09dda77b4c29aa083ff57f4b1eb991b98b68883. This affects an unknown part of the file /studentLogin.php. This manipulation of the argument Email causes sql injection. The attack is possible to be carried out remotely. The exploit has been published and may be used. This product adopts a rolling release strategy to maintain continuous delivery The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way.
